Recent Talks

JavaScript: The Gateway Language, or, Why You Should Teach Your Kids JavaScript

17 March 2014 • talk, javascript, 2014, mountainwestjs, education, and kids

Read more

When we talk about JavaScript, we're not really talking about JavaScript: we're talking about JavaScript and its various libraries, frameworks, and compilers. JavaScript is a gateway language for new technologists, providing a large amount of functionality spread across numerous libraries, growing in complexity with the students' skill. Prepare your children for Skynet: teach them JavaScript.

Ruby Basics Workshop

Read more

Created for Instructure's internal tech conference (Pandamonium), this two-hour workshop serves as a basic introduction to Ruby for complete beginners.

How a feature is born

3 November 2013 • talk, lightning-talk, railsgirls, and 2013

Read more

A high-level overview presented as a lightning talk for RailsGirls Chicago 2013. This presentation explains how a feature goes from an idea to live for users at Instructure.
